name: Pattern.Codespaces.WebSocket
observations: GitHub Codespaces requires direct WebSocket to backend port (12001) not through frontend proxy
Replace port in URL: window.location.host.replace('-12000.', '-12001.')
Frontend proxy corrupts binary WebSocket data
Use window.location for dynamic URL construction
